text: Aisay logon per jo kay eman rakhtay hon aur nek kaam kertay hon iss cheez mein koi gunah nahi jiss ko woh khatay peetay hon jabkay woh log taqwa rakhtay hon aur eman rakhtay hon aur nek kaam kertay hon phir perhezgari kertay hon aur khoob nek amal kertay hon Allah aisay neko kaaron say mohabbat rakhta hai
